description: Single storey rear/ side extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope and external flank flue
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2202_P010 Ground Floor Plan: Proposed (Revision B), 2202_P011 First Floor Plan: Proposed (Revision B), 2202_P012 Second Floor Plan: Proposed (Revision B), 2202_P013 Roof Plan: Proposed (Revision A), 2202_P030 Front Elevation: Proposed (Revision C),2202_P031 Rear Elevation: Proposed (Revision D), 2202_P032 Side Elevation: Proposed.(Revision D) and 2202_P040 Section 01: Proposed (Revision A)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse, except where indicated on the hereby approved plans listed in Condition 2; and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12.

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
| The proposed windows to the first and second floor flank windows, above a height of 1.7m shall be obscure glazed and non-opening.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and National Planning Policy Framework 2022- section 12.
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, London Plan policy D3 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
| The development will not install any wood burning stove or use any solid fuels in the stove (to which the flue is attached).

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, London Plan policy D3 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
